author: sky.cactus
content: It is unlikely that we'll see that much ETH staked, as staking is a risky endeavor that requires locking your funds for an extended period of time and operating/maintaining validating clients.  For many people, this isn't worth the ~5% annual returns you would get (assuming you do your job perfectly and don't get penalized in any way).
